docs.title: Paper Prowler
docs.text: The Paper Prowler is A versatile tool that aggregates and organizes web content like RSS feeds, arXiv papers to streamline your research and information management.

docs.title: Pipeline
docs.text: The Paper Prowler pipeline is a series of steps that are executed to fetch, process, and store the data. The pipeline relies on configuration files to specify the steps and their parameters and writes and updates a Haystack InMemoryDocumentStore with the processed data.
